      @CrossOrigin(origins="*", allowedHeaders="*") @GetMapping("admin/request/{r_id}/comment") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public java.util.List<Comment> getAllCommentsFromRequestAsAdmin​(@PathVariable int r_id, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.io.IOException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
